10#define idea_mul(r,a,b,ul) \
11ul=(IDEA_INT)a*b; \
12if (ul != 0) \
13 { \
14 r=(ul&0xffff)-(ul>>16); \
15 r-=((r)>>16); \
16 } \
17else \
18 r=(-(int)a-b+1); /* assuming a or b is 0 and in range */
19
20/* NOTE - c is not incremented as per n2l */
21#define n2ln(c,l1,l2,n) { \
22 c+=n; \
23 l1=l2=0; \
24 switch (n) { \
25 case 8: l2 =((IDEA_INT)(*(--(c)))) ; \
26 case 7: l2|=((IDEA_INT)(*(--(c))))<< 8; \
27 case 6: l2|=((IDEA_INT)(*(--(c))))<<16; \
28 case 5: l2|=((IDEA_INT)(*(--(c))))<<24; \
29 case 4: l1 =((IDEA_INT)(*(--(c)))) ; \
30 case 3: l1|=((IDEA_INT)(*(--(c))))<< 8; \
31 case 2: l1|=((IDEA_INT)(*(--(c))))<<16; \
32 case 1: l1|=((IDEA_INT)(*(--(c))))<<24; \
33 } \
34 }
35
36/* NOTE - c is not incremented as per l2n */
37#define l2nn(l1,l2,c,n) { \
38 c+=n; \
39 switch (n) { \
40 case 8: *(--(c))=(unsigned char)(((l2) )&0xff); \
41 /* fall thru */ \
42 case 7: *(--(c))=(unsigned char)(((l2)>> 8)&0xff); \
43 /* fall thru */ \
44 case 6: *(--(c))=(unsigned char)(((l2)>>16)&0xff); \
45 /* fall thru */ \
46 case 5: *(--(c))=(unsigned char)(((l2)>>24)&0xff); \
47 /* fall thru */ \
48 case 4: *(--(c))=(unsigned char)(((l1) )&0xff); \
49 /* fall thru */ \
50 case 3: *(--(c))=(unsigned char)(((l1)>> 8)&0xff); \
51 /* fall thru */ \
52 case 2: *(--(c))=(unsigned char)(((l1)>>16)&0xff); \
53 /* fall thru */ \
54 case 1: *(--(c))=(unsigned char)(((l1)>>24)&0xff); \
55 } \
56 }
57
58#undef n2l
59#define n2l(c,l) (l =((IDEA_INT)(*((c)++)))<<24L, \
60 l|=((IDEA_INT)(*((c)++)))<<16L, \
61 l|=((IDEA_INT)(*((c)++)))<< 8L, \
62 l|=((IDEA_INT)(*((c)++))))
63
64#undef l2n
65#define l2n(l,c) (*((c)++)=(unsigned char)(((l)>>24L)&0xff), \
66 *((c)++)=(unsigned char)(((l)>>16L)&0xff), \
67 *((c)++)=(unsigned char)(((l)>> 8L)&0xff), \
68 *((c)++)=(unsigned char)(((l) )&0xff))
69
70#undef s2n
71#define s2n(l,c) (*((c)++)=(unsigned char)(((l) )&0xff), \
72 *((c)++)=(unsigned char)(((l)>> 8L)&0xff))
73
74#undef n2s
75#define n2s(c,l) (l =((IDEA_INT)(*((c)++)))<< 8L, \
76 l|=((IDEA_INT)(*((c)++))) )
77
78
79#define E_IDEA(num) \
80 x1&=0xffff; \
81 idea_mul(x1,x1,*p,ul); p++; \
82 x2+= *(p++); \
83 x3+= *(p++); \
84 x4&=0xffff; \
85 idea_mul(x4,x4,*p,ul); p++; \
86 t0=(x1^x3)&0xffff; \
87 idea_mul(t0,t0,*p,ul); p++; \
88 t1=(t0+(x2^x4))&0xffff; \
89 idea_mul(t1,t1,*p,ul); p++; \
90 t0+=t1; \
91 x1^=t1; \
92 x4^=t0; \
93 ul=x2^t0; /* do the swap to x3 */ \
94 x2=x3^t1; \
95 x3=ul;
96
